TopicTitle: Can i get topographic maps in game stock no mods?

Articles.Content: Hi is there a way to get slope data for landing spaces on planets with the stock KSP?So i do not have to repetitively send Scansats to other planets?

4 minutes ago, Cloakedwand72 said:

Hi is there a way to get slope data for landing spaces on planets with the stock KSP?So i do not have to repetitively send Scansats to other planets?

Nope, nothing in stock.  ScanSat's probably your best bet.

(unless you can just find maps on the internet somewhere)

Edited February 19, 2016 by Snark

1 hour ago, Snark said:

Nope, nothing in stock.  ScanSat's probably your best bet.

(unless you can just find maps on the internet somewhere)

How do i enter the landing location on mechjeb for the Autoland feature?

If there are lets say

Mun landing laditude is

3.0322 -101.1182?What dos the minus mean i do not see that on the auto land longitude and latutude.

It looks to me like your coordinates are latitude 3.0322, longitude -101.1182. Pretty near the equator. If that's not correct, then I don't know what you are asking.

I.e., 3 degrees north, -101 degrees east. (-101 degrees east = 101 degrees west.) 

-101 degrees east is also 360-101 = 259 degrees east.

Some people split longitude from -180 to 180.  Some from 0 to 360.  Means the same thing. Add or subtract 360 degrees from numbers below zero or above 180 respectively to convert between the two forms.

Edited February 20, 2016 by Yasmy

Alternately you can also install Malah's StockScanSat plugin.

Which add ScanSat abilities to stock resource scanner.
